divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: This sighting happenned approx one month ago. I was driving down the "T" road towards Crestone. This road directly faces the Sangre de Cristo mountains. I saw what appeared to be a single large light hovering over the Sangres. This light was larger than anything I ve ever witnessed. It "split" into 3 lights, one in the middle and one on either side, equal-distant from each other. Duration of sighting was approx 2 minutes. The lights "merged" back into a single point and was gone. None of the lights were observed to be moving away...they just were here now and then gone.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Crestone
There were no other sightings in Crestone on or around February 27th 2005
